EmailTemplate.name: BMI 10.2 Upgrade Testing
EmailTemplate.subject: Big Machines 10.2 Upgrade User Accept Testing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Receiving_User.FirstName},
The IT team is pleased to announce that Big Machines, our integrated quoting tool, has made substantial enhancements with its release of Big Machines v.10.2. We look forward to passing these enhancements along to to our end users.
User acceptance testing must be completed prior to implementing these changes in our organization. In order to ensure that these changes are implemented seamlessly, as a super user, please complete the attached test scripts by the end of the business day on October 28th.
This testing should be completed in our Big Machines testing environment: http://testio.bigmachines.com. If you have forgotten your password, please email me at {!User.Email}, and I will be reset your login credentials. Both testing sign-off is required from both MISD and LISD before we can cut over to the new version.
Thank you in advance for your cooperation.
Regards,
